Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.AbstractGameLogic
        • model.GameLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameLogic

    public class GameLogic
extends AbstractGameLogic
    Represents the complete game logic.
    Author:
    Sebastian Alfaro
